languages.text: "Мысль о существовании в одном секторе с ксеносами внушает отвращение, но их присутствие в вашей свите здесь, в столице торговой династии фон Валанциус приводит меня в бешенство. Ни один ксенос не смеет марать улицы этой планеты после того, что ей пришлось пережить. Тем более — под защитой Вольного Торговца!" {n}Махарий делает глубокий вдох и шумно выдыхает. Несмотря на отступившую ярость, Зауэрбэк не прекращает прожигать вас взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мысль о существовании в одном секторе с ксеносами внушает отвращение, но их присутствие в вашей свите здесь, в столице торговой династии фон Воланциус приводит меня в бешенство. Ни один ксенос не смеет марать улицы этой планеты после того, что ей пришлось пережить. Тем более, под защитой Вольного Торговца". {n}Махарий делает глубокий вдох и шумно выдыхает. Несмотря на отступившую ярость, Зауэрбек не прекращает прожигать вас взглядом.{/n}

languages.text: "The thought of existing in the same sector as xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trade dynasty, enrages me. To have xenos sullying the streets of this planet after what we endured — and under the protection of the Rogue Trader, no less!" {n}Sauerback takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. His rage subsides, but his burning gaze remains fixed on you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мысль о существовании в одном секторе с ксеносами внушает отвращение, но их присутствие в вашей свите здесь, в столице торговой династии фон Валанциус приводит меня в бешенство. Ни один ксенос не смеет марать улицы этой планеты после того, что ей пришлось пережить. Тем более — под защитой Вольного Торговца!" {n}Махарий делает глубокий вдох и шумно выдыхает. Несмотря на отступившую ярость, Зауэрбэк не прекращает прожигать вас взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The thought of existing in the same sector with the xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital, makes me lose my mind. No xenos dares to sully the streets of this planet — considering what it had to go through. And especially not under the protection of the Rogue Trader!" {n}Macharias takes a deep breath and breathes out noisily. In spite of his subsided rage, he does not take his eyes of you.{/n}

"The thought of existing in the same sector with the xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital, makes me lose my mind. No xenos dares to sully the streets of this planet — considering what it had to go through. And especially not under the protection of the Rogue Trader!" {n}Macharias takes a deep breath and breathes out noisily. In spite of his subsided rage, he does not take his eyes of you.{/n}

"The thought of existing in the same sector with the xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trading family, makes me lose my mind. No xenos dares to sully the streets of this planet—considering what it had to go through. Much less under the protection of the Rogue Trader!" {n}Macharius takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. Despite his rage having subsided, he keeps staring at you.{/n}

"The thought of existing in the same sector with the xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trading family, makes me lose my mind. No xenos dares to sully the streets of this planet—considering what it had to go through. Much less under the protection of the Rogue Trader!" {n}Macharius takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. Despite his rage having subsided, he keeps staring at you.{/n}

"The thought of existing in the same sector as xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trade dynasty, enrages me. To have xenos sullying the streets of this planet after what we endured — and under the protection of the Rogue Trader, no less!" {n}Sauerback takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. His rage subsides, but his burning gaze remains fixed on you.{/n}

"The thought of existing in the same sector as xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trade dynasty, enrages me. To have xenos sullying the streets of this planet after what we endured — and under the protection of the Rogue Trader, no less!" {n}Sauerback takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. His rage subsides, but his burning gaze remains fixed on you.{/n}

languages.text: 「同じ宙域に異種族がいると考えるだけで実に不快です。あまつさえ、陛下の供としてここ、フォン・ヴァランシウス貿易共同体の首都に存在するとなれば私の気も狂いましょう。恐れ多くもこの星を汚らしい脚で闊歩する異種族など…まして、自由開拓者の保護下にあるなど！」{n}マハリウスは深呼吸をして大きなため息をつく。怒りが収まってもなお、その燃えるような眼差しであなたを見続けている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The thought of existing in the same sector as xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trade dynasty, enrages me. To have xenos sullying the streets of this planet after what we endured — and under the protection of the Rogue Trader, no less!" {n}Sauerback takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. His rage subsides, but his burning gaze remains fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「同じ宙域に異種族がいると考えるだけで実に不快です。あまつさえ、陛下の供としてここ、フォン・ヴァランシウス貿易共同体の首都に存在するとなれば私の気も狂いましょう。恐れ多くもこの星を汚らしい脚で闊歩する異種族など…まして、自由開拓者の保護下にあるなど！」{n}マハリウスは深呼吸をして大きなため息をつく。怒りが収まってもなお、その燃えるような眼差しであなたを見続けている。{/n}

languages.text: “与异形共同生活，这个想法已经足够令人不快。至于现在，这些异形身为您的随从，竟敢堂而皇之地出现在冯·瓦兰修斯贸易王朝的首都，这实在是让我怒不可遏。那群异形大肆破坏这颗行星，现在他们居然还敢大摇大摆地走在街上？甚至还能得到行商浪人的庇护！”{n}马卡里乌斯深吸了一口气，用力呼了出来。他的怒火已渐渐平息，但他炽烈的目光依然紧盯着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The thought of existing in the same sector as xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trade dynasty, enrages me. To have xenos sullying the streets of this planet after what we endured — and under the protection of the Rogue Trader, no less!" {n}Sauerback takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. His rage subsides, but his burning gaze remains fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “与异形共同生活，这个想法已经足够令人不快。至于现在，这些异形身为您的随从，竟敢堂而皇之地出现在冯·瓦兰修斯贸易王朝的首都，这实在是让我怒不可遏。那群异形大肆破坏这颗行星，现在他们居然还敢大摇大摆地走在街上？甚至还能得到行商浪人的庇护！”{n}马卡里乌斯深吸了一口气，用力呼了出来。他的怒火已渐渐平息，但他炽烈的目光依然紧盯着你。{/n}

languages.text: « Comme si le fait qu'ils sillonnent notre secteur n'était pas déjà suffisamment révoltant, voilà que vous en intégrez dans votre entourage et que vous paradez avec dans la capitale même de la dynastie von Valancius ! Après tout ce que nous avons enduré, aucun xénos ne devrait être autorisé à se montrer en ville, et encore moins sous la protection {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! » {n}Sauerback reprend bruyamment son souffle après avoir déclamé sa tirade d'un seul trait. Même s'il semble s'être légèrement calmé, il continue à vous dévisager de son regard enfiévré.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The thought of existing in the same sector as xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trade dynasty, enrages me. To have xenos sullying the streets of this planet after what we endured — and under the protection of the Rogue Trader, no less!" {n}Sauerback takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. His rage subsides, but his burning gaze remains fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme si le fait qu'ils sillonnent notre secteur n'était pas déjà suffisamment révoltant, voilà que vous en intégrez dans votre entourage et que vous paradez avec dans la capitale même de la dynastie von Valancius ! Après tout ce que nous avons enduré, aucun xénos ne devrait être autorisé à se montrer en ville, et encore moins sous la protection {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! » {n}Sauerback reprend bruyamment son souffle après avoir déclamé sa tirade d'un seul trait. Même s'il semble s'être légèrement calmé, il continue à vous dévisager de son regard enfiévré.{/n}

languages.text: «La idea de existir en el mismo sector que los xenos ya es repugnante, pero su presencia en su séquito, aquí, en la capital de la dinastía comercial von Valancius, es algo que me enfurece. Pensar que hay xenos mancillando las calles del planeta con su presencia después de lo que hemos sufrido... ¡y, por si fuera poco, cuentan con la protección de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!». {n}Sauerback respira profundamente y resopla con fuerza. Aunque contiene su ira, no aparta su abrasadora mirada de ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The thought of existing in the same sector as xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trade dynasty, enrages me. To have xenos sullying the streets of this planet after what we endured — and under the protection of the Rogue Trader, no less!" {n}Sauerback takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. His rage subsides, but his burning gaze remains fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La idea de existir en el mismo sector que los xenos ya es repugnante, pero su presencia en su séquito, aquí, en la capital de la dinastía comercial von Valancius, es algo que me enfurece. Pensar que hay xenos mancillando las calles del planeta con su presencia después de lo que hemos sufrido... ¡y, por si fuera poco, cuentan con la protección de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!». {n}Sauerback respira profundamente y resopla con fuerza. Aunque contiene su ira, no aparta su abrasadora mirada de ti.{/n}

languages.text: "Allein der Gedanke, im selben Sektor wie Xenos zu existieren, ist abstoßend. Aber ihre Anwesenheit in Eurem Gefolge, hier, in der Hauptstadt der Handelsdynastie derer von Valancius ... macht mich wütend. Dass sich nach allem, was wir ertragen mussten, Xenos auf den Straßen dieses Planeten tummeln ... noch dazu unter dem Schutz {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, macht es noch schlimmer!" {n}Sauerback holt tief Luft und atmet dann geräuschvoll aus. Sein Zorn legt sich, aber sein wütender Blick ist noch immer auf dich gerichtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The thought of existing in the same sector as xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trade dynasty, enrages me. To have xenos sullying the streets of this planet after what we endured — and under the protection of the Rogue Trader, no less!" {n}Sauerback takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. His rage subsides, but his burning gaze remains fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Schon der Gedanke, im selben Sektor wie die Xenos zu existieren, ist abstoßend. Doch ihre Anwesenheit in Eurer Gefolge, hier, in der Hauptstadt der Handelsfamilie von Valancius ... das treibt mich in den Wahnsinn. Kein Xenos wagt es, die Straßen dieses Planeten zu verschandeln — wenn man bedenkt, was er durchmachen musste. Und schon gar nicht unter dem Schutz {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}!" {n}Macharius atmet tief ein und dann lautstark aus. Seine Wut hat sich zwar gelegt, er starrt dich aber weiterhin an.{/n}

languages.text: "Zenolarla aynı sektörde bulunmak dahi kabul edilemezken onları von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığının başkentinde, sizin maiyetinizde görmek beni küplere bindiriyor. Çektiğimiz onca çileden sonra gezegenin sokaklarında zeno görmek... Hem de Hür Tacir'in koruması altında, pes doğrusu!" {n}Sauerback, derin bir nefes alıp aynı nefesi duyulur biçimde geri veriyor. Öfkesi dinse de alev saçan gözleriyle sana bakmayı sürdürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The thought of existing in the same sector as xenos is revolting, but their presence in your retinue, here, in the capital city of the von Valancius trade dynasty, enrages me. To have xenos sullying the streets of this planet after what we endured — and under the protection of the Rogue Trader, no less!" {n}Sauerback takes a deep breath and exhales noisily. His rage subsides, but his burning gaze remains fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zenolarla aynı sektörde yaşamak zaten kabul edilemez. Fakat onları von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığının başkentinde, sizin maiyetinizde görmek beni küplere bindiriyor. Çektiğimiz onca çileden sonra gezegenin sokaklarında zenolar görmek... Hem de Hür Tacir'in koruması altında, pes doğrusu!" {n}Sauerback derin bir nefes alıp aynı nefesi duyulur biçimde geri veriyor. Öfkesi dinse de alev saçan gözleriyle sana bakmayı sürdürüyor.{/n}
